faqItems.title: How long does a construction project usually take?
faqItems.description: Timelines vary based on project size and complexity.

faqItems.title: What are the payment terms?
faqItems.description: Payment terms are typically outlined in the contract.

faqItems.title: Do you offer warranties on your work?
faqItems.description: Yes, we provide warranties for our construction services.

faqItems.title: Can I see examples of your previous work?
faqItems.description: Absolutely, we have a portfolio available for review.

faqItems.title: What safety measures do you implement on-site?
faqItems.description: We follow strict safety protocols to ensure a safe working environment.
